results.title: Lisinopril improves endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ improves @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@hypertensive NIDDM@@@ subjects with @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Nielsen FS, Rossing P, Gall MA, Smidt UM, Chen JW, Sato A, Parving HH. Lisinopril improves endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy. Scand J Clin Lab Invest. 1997 Aug;57(5):427-34. PMID: 9279969

results.title: Effects of atorvastatin and lisinopril on endothelial dysfunction in patients with Behcet's disease.
results.text_hl: Effects of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Behcet_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D001528 @@@Behcet's disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Inanc MT, Kalay N, Heyit T, Ozdogru I, Kaya MG, Dogan A, Duran M, Kasapkara HA, Gunebakmaz O, Borlu M, Yarlıoglues M, Oguzhan A. Effects of atorvastatin and lisinopril on endothelial dysfunction in patients with Behcet's disease. Echocardiography. 2010 Sep;27(8):997-1003. PMID: 20545993

results.title: Improvement of endothelial dysfunction in experimental heart failure by chronic RAAS-blockade: ACE-inhibition or AT1-receptor blockade?
results.text_hl: Therefore we compared the effects of the ACE-I @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ vs. the ARB @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@.

citations.NLM: Wagenaar LJ, Buikema H, Pinto YM, van Gilst WH. Improvement of endothelial dysfunction in experimental heart failure by chronic RAAS-blockade: ACE-inhibition or AT1-receptor blockade? J Renin Angiotensin Aldosterone Syst. 2001 Mar;2(1_suppl):S64-S69. PMID: 28095251

results.title: [Correction of endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus during combined antihypertensive therapy].
results.text_hl: AIM: To evaluate the impact of 6-month antihypertensive therapy with the combined drug @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (ekvator) on @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@ED@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Carbohydrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002241 @@@carbohydrate@@@ metabolic parameters in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@).

citations.NLM: Statsenko ME, Derevianchenko MV. [Correction of endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus during combined antihypertensive therapy]. Ter Arkh. 2014;86(8):90-3. PMID: 25306751
citations.BibTeX: @article{25306751, title={[Correction of endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus during combined antihypertensive therapy].}, author={Statsenko ME and Derevianchenko MV}, journal={Ter Arkh}, volume={86}, number={8}, pages={90-3}}

results.title: [Endothelial dysfunction is a target for combination antihypertensive therapy in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus].
results.text_hl: AIM: To evaluate the impact of combination antihypertensive therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (Ekvator) on @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and concurrent @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@).

citations.NLM: Statsenko ME, Derevianchenko MV, Ostrovskiĭ OV, Titarenko MN, Shvets MK, Bondarev AM. [Endothelial dysfunction is a target for combination antihypertensive therapy in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus]. Ter Arkh. 2013;85(9):63-8. PMID: 24261232

results.title: Vasomotor responses in cyclosporin A-treated rats after chronic angiotensin blockade.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@Cyclosporin A@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ was prevented by cotreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or @CHEMICAL_ICI_D8731 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081112 @@@D 8731@@@.

citations.NLM: Auch-Schwelk W, Duske E, Hink U, Betz M, Unkelbach M, Fleck E. Vasomotor responses in cyclosporin A-treated rats after chronic angiotensin blockade. Hypertension. 1994 Jun;23(6 Pt 2):832-7. PMID: 8206613

results.title: [Pulmonary hypertension, endothelial dysfunction, and their correction with lisinopril in patients with heart failure in combination of ischemic heart disease and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease].
results.text_hl: [@DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@Pulmonary hypertension@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and their correction with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ in combination of @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@chronic obstructive pulmonary disease@@@].

citations.NLM: Pribylov SA. [Pulmonary hypertension, endothelial dysfunction, and their correction with lisinopril in patients with heart failure in combination of ischemic heart disease and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease]. Kardiologiia. 2006;46(9):36-40. PMID: 17047621
citations.BibTeX: @article{17047621, title={[Pulmonary hypertension, endothelial dysfunction, and their correction with lisinopril in patients with heart failure in combination of ischemic heart disease and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease].}, author={Pribylov SA}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={46}, number={9}, pages={36-40}}

results.title: [Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery endothelium disfunction and painless myocardial ischemia in premenopausal women with hypertension].
results.text_hl: The results show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy in premenopausal @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ can stop or even cause regression of @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LV myocardial hypertrophy@@@ and produce favorable effect on @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@LV remodeling@@@ mostly in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with concentric type of @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ and/or without @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and has positive effect on frequency of painless @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@myocardial ischemia@@@ events.

citations.NLM: Khabibulina MM. [Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery endothelium disfunction and painless myocardial ischemia in premenopausal women with hypertension]. Kardiologiia. 2010;50(1):16-21. PMID: 20144153
citations.BibTeX: @article{20144153, title={[Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery endothelium disfunction and painless myocardial ischemia in premenopausal women with hypertension].}, author={Khabibulina MM}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={50}, number={1}, pages={16-21}}

results.title: Defensive effect of natrium diethyldithiocarbamate trihydrate (NDDCT) and lisinopril in DOCA-salt hypertension-induced vascular dementia in rats.
results.text_hl: Treatments of NDDCT as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ significantly attenuated @CHEMICAL_Desoxycorticosterone_Acetate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D064791 @@@DOCA@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@-induced @DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@impairment of learning and memory@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and changes in various biochemical levels.

citations.NLM: Sharma B, Singh N. Defensive effect of natrium diethyldithiocarbamate trihydrate (NDDCT) and lisinopril in DOCA-salt hypertension-induced vascular dementia in rats. Psychopharmacology (Berl). 2012 Oct;223(3):307-17. PMID: 22526544
citations.BibTeX: @article{22526544, title={Defensive effect of natrium diethyldithiocarbamate trihydrate (NDDCT) and lisinopril in DOCA-salt hypertension-induced vascular dementia in rats.}, author={Sharma B and Singh N}, journal={Psychopharmacology (Berl)}, volume={223}, number={3}, pages={307-17}}

results.title: Endothelial factors and microvascular hypertensive disease.
results.text_hl: A significant improvement in @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ may be observed in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ after prolonged treatment with ACE inhibitors (@CHEMICAL_Cilazapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017315 @@@cilazapril@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@), @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ entry blockers (@CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@), and angiotensin II receptor blockers (@CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@), while @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and hydrochlorotiazide proved to be ineffective in this regard despite similar blood pressure reductions.

citations.NLM: Rizzoni D, Agabiti-Rosei E. Endothelial factors and microvascular hypertensive disease. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2001 Nov;38 Suppl 2():S15-8. PMID: 11811369
citations.BibTeX: @article{11811369, title={Endothelial factors and microvascular hypertensive disease.}, author={Rizzoni D and Agabiti-Rosei E}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={38 Suppl 2}, pages={S15-8}}
